title: RentFinder
description: A property rental portal with smart filtering and neighborhood insights.
introduction: RentFinder is designed to revolutionize the rental search experience by providing users with intelligent filtering options and comprehensive neighborhood data, making the hunt for the perfect rental property seamless and informed.

sections.title: Motivation
sections.body: The rental market often lacks transparency, with outdated listings and insufficient neighborhood insights. RentFinder was born out of a need to empower renters with accurate, real-time data and advanced filtering to simplify their search process.

sections.title: Prototype Development
sections.body: We started by building a Minimum Viable Product (MVP) using React for the frontend and Node.js for the backend. This allowed us to test core functionalities like smart filtering and neighborhood data integration, ensuring a solid foundation for future enhancements.

sections.title: Launch and Feedback
sections.body: After launching the MVP, we gathered user feedback to refine our interface and improve the user experience. This phase was crucial for identifying key features and making necessary adjustments to meet user expectations.

sections.title: Advanced Features
sections.body: We introduced AI-driven recommendations to suggest properties based on user preferences and behavior. Additionally, we enhanced neighborhood data with crime statistics and local amenities, providing users with a holistic view of potential areas.

sections.title: Future Plans
sections.body: Looking ahead, RentFinder aims to expand to more cities and integrate virtual tours. We're also exploring partnerships with local businesses to offer exclusive deals, further enriching the rental experience.
